T02D2743:128a-0: @128a * // thugs rje chen po ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2743:128a-1: rnal 'byor dbang phyug byams pa dang //
T02D2743:128a-2: snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms las //
T02D2743:128a-3: byung ba'i byang chub sems kyi bdag /'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal //
T02D2743:128a-4: de zhabs padmo la reg pas //
T02D2743:128a-5: 'jig rten sdug bsngal bsgral ba'i phyir //
T02D2743:128a-6: ji bzhin ji ltar sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D2743:128a-7: mdor bsdus bdag gis bstan par bya //
T02D2743:128a-8: mkha' ltar dri med stong nyid dbyings //
T02D2743:128a-9: dbang po'i gzhu ltar gsal ba'i dngos //
T02D2743:128a-10: padmo zla ba rgyas la gsungs thugs 'od 'phro sgyu ma'i rnam thar sprul pa'i sku //
T02D2743:128a-11: rab mdzes sku ni gzi brjid brtan mdzes 'bar ba'i 'od zer dkar 'khrigs pa //
T02D2743:128a-12: skyil krung phyed brkyang dul ba'i phyag g-yas mchog sbyin
T02D2743:128a-13: padmo g-yon gyi phyag / padmo sdong mdzes dri med
T02D2743:128a-14: 'dab rgyas gzhon nu sgeg mo'i thugs kar 'dzin //
T02D2743:128a-15: shel ltar dri med autpal spyan ring kun nas yid 'phrog 'od 'bar zhal //
T02D2743:128a-16: brtan po dkar gsal zla rgyas stong lhag ral pa'i cod pan thub pa'i gdan//
T02D2743:128a-17: 'bar ba'i rin chen dri med sna tshogs shin tu 'od sbyangs legs spras mdzes //
T02D2743:128a-18: mkha' la nyi ltar lham me lhang nge nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs 'od 'gyed pa //
T02D2743:128a-19: dpe byang mtshan rdzogs gcig pu skyob pa skyabs kyi dam pa bla med ni //
T02D2743:128b-0: shin tu rtogs dka' de nyid bzhir gyur snying gi @128b pad 'dab hr'i:yig gis //
T02D2743:128b-1: gang ba'i phyogs rnams de bzhin de gzugs aom dang a'a:dang hr'i:h'um bsam //
T02D2743:128b-2: dkar sogs kha dog ngag gi phreng ba yid ni ye shes yig 'bru'i dngos //
T02D2743:128b-3: brtse ba'i rlung bskyod ye shes mi 'bar 'gro ba'i
T02D2743:128b-4: sdig tshogs bud shing bsreg / zhi ba'i dang la
T02D2743:128b-5: gnyis med mi dmigs mkha' ltar spros bral ro gcig
T02D2743:128b-6: ro // bde chen 'byung gnas ye shes dri med mnyam gzhag chen por bsgom par bya //
T02D2743:128b-7: de rjes mchod sogs dag pa'i yan lag cho ga ji bzhin ye shes sems dpa' legs bcug ste //
T02D2743:128b-8: rnam gsum 'khor ba dkar dmar sngo tshul go rims ji bzhin sku gsung thugs //
T02D2743:128b-9: mtho ris sa steng ngan 'gro'i sar gnas skye dgu'i snying rab sim byed pas //
T02D2743:128b-10: brtan g-yo'i mtshan nyid dam pa'i zhal bzhin mkhas pas rab tu shes par bya //
